Documentation for the Code¶

O3as REST API provides access to O3as (Ozone assessment) data for plotting. The API leverages Swagger, Flask, and Connexion.

api¶

Description of the O3as REST API methods:

o3as.api.get_metadata(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Return information about the package

Returns

The o3as package info

Return type

dict

o3as.api.get_model_info(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Return information about the Ozone model

Returns

Info about the Ozone model

Return type

dict

o3as.api.list_models(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Return the list of available Ozone models

Returns

The list of available models

Return type

dict

o3as.api.plot(*args, **kwargs)[source]¶

Main plotting routine

Parameters

kwargs – The provided in the API call parameters

Returns

Either PDF plot or JSON document

plots¶

Description of the O3as classes to extact data for plotting:

class o3as.plots.DataSelection(plot_type, **kwargs)[source]¶

Class to perform data selection, based on Dataset.

Parameters

  • b_year – Year to start data scanning from

  • e_year – Year to finish data scanning

  • lat_min – Minimum latitude to define the range (-90..90)

  • lat_max – Maximum latitude to define the range (-90..90)

get_dataslice(model)[source]¶

Function to select the slice of data according to the time and latitude requested

Parameters

model – The model to process

Returns

xarray dataset selected according to the time and latitude

Return type

xarray

class o3as.plots.Dataset(plot_type, **kwargs)[source]¶

Base Class to initialize the dataset

Parameters

plot_type – The plot type (e.g. tco3_zm, vmro3_zm, …)

get_dataset(model)[source]¶

Load data from the datafile list

Parameters

model – The model to process

Returns

xarray dataset

Return type

xarray

class o3as.plots.ProcessForTCO3(**kwargs)[source]¶

Subclass of DataSelection to calculate tco3_zm

get_plot_data(model)[source]¶

Process the model to get tco3_zm data for plotting

Parameters

model – The model to process for tco3_zm

Returns

xarray dataset for plotting

Return type

xarray

class o3as.plots.ProcessForTCO3Return(**kwargs)[source]¶

Subclass of DataSelection to calculate tco3_return

get_plot_data(model)[source]¶

Parameters

model – The model to process for tco3_return

Returns

xarray dataset for plotting

Return type

class o3as.plots.ProcessForVMRO3(**kwargs)[source]¶

Subclass of DataSelection to calculate vmro3_zm

o3as.plots.set_data_processing(plot_type, **kwargs)[source]¶

Function to inizialize proper class for data processing

Parameters

plot_type – The plot type (e.g. tco3_zm, vmro3_zm, …)

Returns

object corresponding to the plot type

plothelpers¶

Description of the O3as help functions for plotting:

o3as.plothelpers.get_date_range(ds)[source]¶

Return the range of dates in the provided dataset

Parameters

ds – xarray dataset to check

Returns

date_min, date_max

o3as.plothelpers.get_periodicity(pd_time)[source]¶

Calculate periodicity in the provided data

Parameters

pd_time (pandas DatetimeIndex) – The time period

Returns

Calculated periodicity as the number of points per year

Return type

int

o3as.plothelpers.set_filename(**kwargs)[source]¶

Set file name

Parameters

kwargs – The provided in the API call parameters

Returns

file_name with added input parameters (no extension given!)

Return type

string

o3as.plothelpers.set_plot_title(**kwargs)[source]¶

Set plot title

Parameters

kwargs – The provided in the API call parameters

Returns

plot_title with added input parameters

Return type

string
